about_the_game:
The quick card game of atomic energy!

Step into the microscopic world of particles with Protons & Neutrons, a thrilling card game where atomic power collide! Players take control of Proton and Neutron factions, competing to unlock all the cards by winning exciting matches. With each victory, you'll have a chance to unlock new cards, build stronger factions, and face increasingly challenging enemies in this thrilling race for atomic supremacy.

The game is designed to be quick and easy to pick up, offering a thrilling experience without being time-consuming. Each match is fast-paced, making it perfect for shorter sessions.

The game matches and the game itself offers great replayability thanks to:

Distinct factions: Each faction has its own strengths, weaknesses, and playstyle, offering fresh strategic choices each time you play.

Unique cards with special bonuses: The game is packed with a variety of cards, each providing individual bonuses and effects. Every draw brings new possibilities for countering your opponent's moves.

Dynamic enemy growth: As you grow stronger, so does your enemy. The challenge continuously escalates, keeping you on your toes as the stakes rise.

Multiple difficulty levels: The game can scale in difficulty, allowing you to face off against different levels of enemies. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned player, there’s always a suitable challenge waiting for you.

Enemy abilities: The enemy has access to different abilities, forcing you to adapt and rethink your strategies with each encounter.

Randomized card unlocks: Each new game offers a different order of card unlocks, creating a unique experience every time you play.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 2.0 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1 Ghz or higher
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game as such is not demanding on the computing power of the device.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 2.0 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2 Ghz or higher
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game as such is not demanding on the computing power of the device.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Intel x86 or newer
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game as such is not demanding on the computing power of the device.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Intel x86 or newer
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game as such is not demanding on the computing power of the device.

name: Territors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1 Ghz or higher, AMD Zen core architecture
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game as such is not demanding on the computing power of the device.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1 Ghz or higher, AMD Zen core architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game as such is not demanding on the computing power of the device.

short_description: The quick card game of atomic energy! Enter the world of particles in this fast-paced card game, where Proton and Neutron factions clash in thrilling matchups! Strengthen your factions with powerful elements, outsmart your opponents, and be the first to collect all the particles.
